thread.section_title: La Manufacture - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Small rooms, good beds
thread.title_full: Small rooms, good beds - Review of La Manufacture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JK65Toronto_Canada
title: Small rooms, good beds
text:
I stayed here twice during recent visits to Paris. I found the staff to be very friendly and accommodating. Although the rooms are rather small even by european standards they are clean, have all the facilities and have comfortable beds.
The hotel is well situated near Place d"Italie and the Metro and there are several good restaurants within walking distance.
Room Tip: One side (East) faces a construction site, try for south side facing quiet street See more room tips
